data.title: Distance MBA Colleges In North East States
data.meta_description: Discover the bestOnline/Distance MBA Colleges in India's enchanting North East region. Elevate your career with flexible learning.
data.text:
Management education or you can say MBA, they were popular decades ago, but they are still relevant today. This ever-evolving global economy requires skilled business leaders to drive the force of change and yield profitable results. Because at one point in business, your specialised or niche skills won’t be enough to run the business. You need adequate business knowledge and management aptitude. This is precisely why, an MBA has been a prestigious qualification globally.

In recent years, with employers’ popularity and higher acceptance of online degrees, universities have seen even higher enrollment in online/distance MBA courses. If you also plan to pursue an online/distance MBA and move towards career growth, you are at the right place.

Best Online/Distance MBA Colleges in the North East States

In this blog, we researched for you and compiled a list of online/distance MBA colleges in the North East states. North-Eastern Indi, known as the seven sister states, incorporates Mizoram, Meghalaya, Arunachal Pradesh, Assam, Tripura, Nagaland, and Manipur. From the famous Kaziranga National Park to its ethnic groups and Muga silk, the North East states of India hold immense significance. However, not many colleges are recognised by UGC as offering distance and online MBA courses. Then again, online education is not something that will let geographical constraints come your way of pursuing your education.

Let’s have a look at the top online/distance MBA colleges in the North East States:

1. Krishna Kanta Handique State Open University

In the entire region of North East India, Krishna Kanta Handique State Open University is the only UGC-DEB-approved open university. The University offers a wide range of courses and aims to reach out to learners irrespective of their academic backgrounds, geographical conditions and age. Its technologically advanced teaching methods have made higher education accessible in the North Eastern states. The curriculum of distance MBA includes project work in the area of their specialisation to make practice-based learning possible in distance education.

Specialisations Offered:

Human Resource Management

Marketing

Finance

2. Mizoram University

Mizoram University became operational in 2001 and is located in Aizawal, the capital city of Mizoram. Over the years, the University has made significant progress in academics, student support services and infrastructure. It is among the pioneers in India which implemented Choice Based Credit System (CBCS) efficiently. Along with studies, the university has encouraged students to participate equally in sports and other activities. Through the Centre for Distance and Online Education, the university has extended its range to students who could not finish their studies. Its online MBA programme comes in five different specialisations from which to choose.

Specialisations Offered:

Marketing Management

Entrepreneurship

Financial Management

Big Data Analytics

Logistics & Supply Chain Management

Ownership Central University Year of Establishment 2001 Location Mizoram Management Courses Offered Online MBA Entrance Exam NA Fee Structure INR 25,450 – 26,650 per year (varies as per specialisation) Course Duration 2 Years Programme Mode Online Approvals/ Affiliations UGC-DEB Accreditation NAAC A Classes Online

3. IGNOU (Regional Centre)

IGNOU or Indira Gandhi National Open University is a central government-owned university. It is the largest open university with maximum enrollments and the only open university with NAAC A++ grades. It offers more than 300 undergraduate, postgraduate, diploma and certificate courses. The IGNOU admission cycle is twice a year and the exams are conducted at the university’s regional centres. Almost every city, you will find the IGNOU regional centre which provides academic assistance and organises job fairs. There is a placement cell at IGNOU which offers career guidance and placement services.

Specialisations Offered:

Finance Management

Human Resource Management

Marketing Management

Operations Management

Services Management

4. ICFAI Tripura

ICFAI Tripura is a subsidiary of the ICFAI Group with campuses in Hyderabad and Dehradun. The institution is regarded as a premium business school in India, offering various management programmes in offline, online, and distance modes. ICFAI Tripura is a member of the Association of Indian Universities (AIU), the Association of Commonwealth Universities (ACU), and other statutory bodies. This ensures the credibility of the ICFAI degree and highlights the institution’s academic quality.

Online/Distance MBA Eligibility Criteria

Below are the eligibility criteria for the online and distance MBA courses in the North-Eastern states:

You must have completed your bachelor’s degree in any stream from a recognised university in the English stream.

If you are a general category student, you need a minimum of 50% marks to enrol. Otherwise, there is generally a 5% relaxation for reserved category students.

If you have completed your undergraduation, but, are awaiting your final year results, you can still apply to this course in some institutions.

Work experience is not a mandatory criterion for an online/distance MBA.

No age restrictions exist when applying for an online/distance MBA course.

Please note that eligibility will vary between colleges; this is just a generalised criterion you have to fulfil.

Admission Process for Online/Distance MBA

Get your documents ready, we are here to tell you the steps you need to follow to start your online/distance MBA degree.

Fill in the online application on the official university website with basic details like personal information, educational qualifications and work experience, if asked.

The next stage of the application includes document submission.

After this, proceed to the payment of the application fee which is usually between INR 500 to 1000.

The university will then verify your documents

Once you are shortlisted, you have to pay the programme fee to hold your spot.

Receive the confirmation and start your programme.

Summarising

Getting an online/distance MBA degree has become the need of the hour. As we are in the phase of change, it is the upskilling which will help us sail our career boats in the long run. Therefore, start planning your future with an accredited and credible online/distance MBA course. Of course, you have to do thorough research before taking the final call.

Have a successful career!
